message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $1,050,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $1,050,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider $1,125,000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am still not able to meet the price of $1,125,000. I would like to propose $1,100,000 for the product.
